name: Bali
description: Bali is a popular beach destination known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and stunning landscapes.

name: Maldives
description: The Maldives is an archipelago of islands in the Indian Ocean, famous for its crystal-clear waters and luxurious overwater bungalows.

name: Angkor Wat
description: Angkor Wat is a massive temple complex in Cambodia and one of the largest religious monuments in the world.

name: Bagan
description: Bagan is an ancient city in Myanmar known for its impressive collection of Buddhist temples and pagodas.

name: New Zealand
description: New Zealand is a stunning country known for its breathtaking landscapes, including mountains, glaciers, and fjords.

name: Iceland
description: Iceland is a Nordic island country known for its volcanic landscapes, hot springs, and natural wonders like the Northern Lights.
